director.name: Ian A. Hunt Ian A. Hunt

this_title: Egypt Unwrapped: Alexander the Great’s Lost Tomb Season 1
trans_title: 揭秘埃及：消失的亚历山大大帝的墓室 第一季
introduction: This program focuses on the search for one of archaeology’s most sought after finds, the tomb of Alexander. In the process the commentary provides an overview of many aspects of Alexander’s career.The program follows Alexander’s “footsteps” in Egypt through the work of a number of contemporary archaeologists. There is a good deal of archaeology and historical methodology on display as well.Anyone one interested in Alexander’s life and times, Hellenism or later Egyptian history, or archaeology, will find this an interesting program.Denis Mootz
chinese_title: 揭秘埃及：消失的亚历山大大帝的墓室 第一季
foreign_title: Egypt Unwrapped: Alexander the Great’s Lost Tomb Season 1
